title.rendered: “IDF Galilee Division Ready for Any Scenario: Key Insights from Brigadier General Shai Klaper”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

Commander of the Galilee Division to the heads of local authorities and councils in Upper Galilee: “We are prepared for a variety of scenarios – in defense and in attack.”

The commander of the “Galilee” Division (Division 91), Brigadier General Shai Klaper, met this morning (Wednesday) with the heads of local authorities and councils in the Upper Galilee. The division commander presented the main points of the current situation and the readiness of the division’s forces for the continuation ahead.

He also held an open conversation with them and emphasized the importance of close relationships and partnership, especially during these times. He stressed the need to adhere to Home Front Command guidelines and the vigilance of residents, alongside patience and civilian resilience.

From the words of the commander of the Galilee Division, Brigadier General Shai Klaper: “I say this with humility, but we are very well prepared. The events of the last day have been very significant. We are holding situation assessments, and at the same time, we are prepared for a variety of scenarios – in defense and in attack. We are here for the residents and will do whatever is necessary.”

Attached are pictures on the subject: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC12153107
